title: Mobile Learning System Design and Effect Analysis: Blended Learning-Based Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Learners are graduate students/job seekers with smartphones/tablets, exploring mobile technology use in blended learning environments for social science coursework.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the fundamental principles for designing blended learning environments that integrate mobile devices and desktops.
Learners can implement learning modules using video, text, and audio content on 3G/H.264-supported mobile devices.
Learners can evaluate the effectiveness of mobile learning systems that integrate interactive features such as quizzes, discussions, and assignment submissions.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
